StarFlier::

SHe still didn't like the idea. 
"But, I'm not a bit sleepy. I am perfectly fine. I'm wide awake and 
don't need any rest. Not for a long while yet. So, no, I don't want 
to sleep. You can't make me go to sleep.  It's not fair. I don't want 
to have to go to sleep just to do this. Can't I just watch and not 
worry about it? I don't want to have to go to sleep. It's really...."
The machine turned on and her head hit the table top with a thud as 
she passed right out.
